label: A2BCD3E6_cF208_227_e_c_d_f_g-001
title: $G7_{3}$ [Na$_{3}$MgCl(CO$_{3}$)$_{2}$] Structure ({\em Obsolete})
comments: This is the original structure determined by (Shiba, 1931) and given the designation $G7_{3}$ in (Hermann, 1937).  (Negro, 1975) showed that the correct structure was \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BCD3E6_cF208_203_e_c_d_f_g-001}{actually related to cubic pyrochlore}. The two structures are very similar, and a displacement of the oxygen atoms by less than 1{\AA} brings the two structures into agreement.
